Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Editor of a Springer-Gabler Book Series “International Management Studies”.
Member of Review Board - Diversitas- Zeitschrift für Diversity-Forschung und –management

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Presentation at the Sixty-Fifth Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management (AoM), Honolulu, HI, USA.
Presentation at the Annual Conference of the German Academic Association for Business Research (VHB), Nürnberg, Germany.
Presentation at the 10th International Human Resource Management Conference, Santa Fe, NM, USA.
Presentation at the Annual Meeting of the Academy of International Business (AIB), San Diego, CA, USA.
Presentation at the Sixty-Ninth Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management (AoM), Chicago, IL, USA.
Presentation at the International Academy of Management and Business, Orlando, CA, USA.
Presentation at the Seventy-First Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management (AoM), San Antonio, TX, USA.
Presentation at the Annual Conference of the German Academic Association for Business Research (VHB), Bolzano, Italy.
Two presentations at the Seventy-Second Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management (AoM), Boston, MA, USA.
Presentation at the Annual Meeting of the Academy of International Business (AIB), Istanbul, Turkey.
Presentation at the Seventy-Third Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management (AoM), Lake Buena Vista, FL, USA.
Presentation at the European International Business Academy (EIBA) Conference 2013, Bremen, Germany.
Presentation at the Annual Conference of the German Academic Association for Business Research (VHB), Leipzig, Germany, 11.-13. June, 2014.
Presentation at the 6th International Association for Chinese Management Research (IACMR) Conference, Beijing, China.
Presentation at the 13th International Human Resource Management Conference, Cracow, Poland.
Two presentations at the Seventy-fifth Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management (AoM), Vancouver, Canada.
Presentation at the German Academic Association for Business Research Workshop on Human Resource Management, Graz, Austria.
Presentation at the Seventy-Sixth Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management (AoM), Anaheim, CA, USA.
Co-organisation of a Workshop on Internationalisation of Small and Medium Sized Enterprises, Free University of Bozen/Bolzano.
Presentation at German Academic Association for Business Research Workshop on Human Resource Management, Paderborn, Germany.

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Leadership in a research project at Sartorius AG (Germany) for examining employee motivation in the company
Co-organizer of a research project at the AOK (insurance company) in Saxony Anhalt, Germany to examine Corporate Citizenship Behavior at the organisation
Leadership in a research project at the Ministry of Sciences and Economic Affairs of the State Saxony Anhalt, Germany for examining career motivations and hindrances at the ministry

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Inclusion of a Paper to the Best Paper Proceedings of the Academy of Management
Member of the Academy of Management
Member of the Academy of International Business
Inclusion of 2 Papers to the Best Paper Proceeding of the Academy of Management

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: PhD Supervisor at Otto-von-Guericke University Magdeburg, Faculty of Economics and Management, Germany
PhD Supervisor at Leuphana University of Lueneburg, Faculty of Economics and Management, Germany
Member of the PhD Collegio (31st and 32nd Cycle) Faculty of Economics and Management, Free University of Bozen/Bolzano

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Visiting scholar at UC Berkeley, U.S.A.
Lecturer, School of Business, Hochschule Harz – University of Applied Studies and Research, Germany
Visiting scholar at McGill University, Montreal, Canada.

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Assistant Professor of International Human Resource Management, Faculty of Economics and Management, Otto-von-Guericke University Magdeburg, Germany.
Program coordinator for the B.Sc. Program Management and Economics, Otto-von-Guericke University of Magdeburg, Germany.
Deputy Professor of International Management, Faculty of Economics and Management, Otto-von-Guericke University Magdeburg, Germany.
Full Professor of Organization and Management (W3), Innovations Incubator, Leuphana University of Lüneburg, Germany.
Program coordinator for the Major BWL PLUS, Leuphana University of Lueneburg, Germany.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Leadership in a research group on Culture’s Influence on Employee Motivation, members from Germany and U.S.A.
Leadership in a research group on on International Differences in Career Planning and Career Decisiveness – members from Germany, Ukraine, U.S.A.
Member of the X-Culture research group under the leadership of Prof. Vas Taras – University of North Carolina, Greensboro.
Leadership in Research group of Emotional Intelligence and Culture – members from Germany and U.S.A.
Member of a research group on Cultural Archetypes under the leadership of Nicole Richter, University of Southern Denmark.
Member of a research group on Positive Heuristics and Entrepreneurial Team Decision Making under the leadership Elisa Villani - Free University of Bozen/Bolzano.
Member of a research group on Improving the Management of Internationalization of Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises (SMEs) under the leadership of Michael Nippa – Free University of Bozen/Bolzano

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: German Academic Association for Business Research (VHB) grant.
